Road Closure Notice
===================

* [eharrell54](https://www.oakridgenorth.com/profile/eharrell/profile)
* Aug 4, 2025
* 1 min read

Updated: Sep 11, 2025

The work is scheduled to start on Monday, September 15 @ 9am and is expected to re-open on Wednesday, September 17th as soon as we get passing concrete breaks (estimated mid-day).

![](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/2e573f_90f5f45d95a24fbabbd4844825629e3f~mv2.jpg/v1/fill/w_740,h_479,al_c,q_80,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,enc_avif,quality_auto/2e573f_90f5f45d95a24fbabbd4844825629e3f~mv2.jpg)

Hanna Rd will be closed starting 08/05/25.  The closure will last **approx. two 2 weeks** while the grade transition is constructed.  North and south travel will still be allowed through the detour route.

![](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/2e573f_cd4e93dcc1b74c4b8b89b47ebf31a42b~mv2.jpg/v1/fill/w_740,h_479,al_c,q_80,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,enc_avif,quality_auto/2e573f_cd4e93dcc1b74c4b8b89b47ebf31a42b~mv2.jpg)

Hours of Operation: 

Monday - Thursday: 7:30 am - 4:30 pm

Fridays: 8:00 am - 4:00 pm

Closed Saturday & Sunday

27424 Robinson Road

Oak Ridge North, TX 77385

Main Line: 281-292-4648  
Municipal Court: 281-292-8736  
Municipal Court Fax: 281-364-7168

CONTACT POLICE & PUBLIC WORKS

Oak Ridge North, TX 77385

Main Line: 281-292-4648  
Police (non-emergency): 281-292-4643  
Police (24-hour dispatch): 936-538-5900  
Public Works (after hours): 281-939-3341
